summary: Verified that all 3 profile pages (My Listings, Purchases, Sales) are now using DesktopPageLayout component correctly. This fixes the UI inconsistency issue reported in iteration_116. All pages show desktop header with search bar, sidebar navigation with correct active state highlighting, proper unauthenticated state with Sign In button, and footer.
test_credentials: Not required for this test - tested unauthenticated state only
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 11 profile pages now consistently use DesktopPageLayout on desktop. The 3 pages (My Listings, Purchases, Sales) were updated from older mobile-style layout to use the same DesktopPageLayout component as other profile pages. Sidebar navigation works correctly and highlights the active page.
fix_verified: UI inconsistency in 3 profile pages fixed - now using DesktopPageLayout with sidebar
